selections.name: Ginno's Halo
selections.reason: Consistent performer who just missed last start, finishing 2nd by a head. Ratings are solid for this grade.

selections.name: Deflector
selections.reason: Put in a strong run at the mile last start to finish 2nd. Drops slightly in trip which suits.

selections.name: Nortoko
selections.reason: Produced the highest recent speed figure in the field last start. Drawn well to be competitive.

selections.name: Sensesational Star
selections.reason: Showed improvement last start and maps to get a decent run. Each-way claims.

danger_horse.name: Deflector
danger_horse.reason: Proven stamina and recent form makes him a major threat late.

selections.name: Undercut
selections.reason: Consistent type rating 67. Ran a solid 4th in CL1 company last start. Looks well placed here.

selections.name: Cayman Island
selections.reason: Coming off a maiden win with a good figure (66). Steps up but looks capable.

selections.name: Hells Spirit
selections.reason: Another last start maiden winner who draws perfectly in barrier 2. Competitive rating.

selections.name: Blazing Sword
selections.reason: Drops significantly in class from BM66. Carries weight but has the class edge.

danger_horse.name: Blazing Sword
danger_horse.reason: Class runner of the field, if he handles the weight he goes close.

selections.name: Kilmer
selections.reason: Strong form lines, finishing 3rd in a competitive maiden last start. Rates highly (59).

selections.name: Wiser
selections.reason: Narrowly beaten last start (0.8L). Drawn to get the run of the race.

selections.name: Super Jules
selections.reason: Resuming with decent past figures. Can run a race fresh.

selections.name: Trust In Chad
selections.reason: Placed last start and draws the fence. tough to leave out of exotics.

danger_horse.name: Wiser
danger_horse.reason: improving type who is knocking on the door.

selections.name: Frosted Amber
selections.reason: Standout rating of 58 in a weak field. Just missed last start. clearly the one to beat.

selections.name: Inzain Baby
selections.reason: Better than raw form suggests. Rating 48 puts her in the mix for minors.

selections.name: Dantains Prize
selections.reason: Resuming. Has placed previously and draws the inside.

selections.name: Castlebay
selections.reason: First starter who showed promise with a 2nd in a trial.

selections.name: Tallingas Immortal
selections.reason: Fast filly with a high rating of 62. Narrow 2nd last start. Should be too speedy for these.

selections.name: Trader's Guess
selections.reason: Solid 3rd last start. Rating 45 is competitive for the placings.

selections.name: Capital Design
selections.reason: Has shown some ability. Place chance in this field.

selections.name: Wallaby Jack
selections.reason: Experience on side, can run into the money.

selections.name: Narcissist
selections.reason: Consistent galloper with a strong rating (62). 3rd last start in good company.

selections.name: Sargeant Stan
selections.reason: Close 4th last start. Rating 60. Draws barrier 1 to get a soft run.

selections.name: Lyrical Beauty
selections.reason: Drops in class from a CL3. Rating 56. Dangerous in this grade.

selections.name: Magna Mak
selections.reason: Won two starts back. Failed last time but can bounce back.

danger_horse.name: Sargeant Stan
danger_horse.reason: Map favors him significantly from the inside draw.

selections.name: Coco De Luxe
selections.reason: Unbeaten in two starts. Won CL1 easily last time. Rating 74 is superior.

selections.name: Foreman's Gully
selections.reason: Last start winner with a rating of 72. In peak form.

selections.name: Danceenuff
selections.reason: Very consistent mare (Rating 71). Rarely runs a bad race.

selections.name: Three Musketeers
selections.reason: Runner-up to a good horse last start. Rating 64.

danger_horse.name: Foreman's Gully
danger_horse.reason: Winning form is hard to knock, big danger.

selections.name: King Czar
selections.reason: Dominant winner last start by nearly 3L. Rating 61. Hard to beat despite wide draw.

selections.name: Hellberg
selections.reason: Consistent type (Rating 65). Drops in class from BM66. Solid claims.

selections.name: Noir Vitesse
selections.reason: Narrow 2nd last start. Won maiden prior. Improving type.

selections.name: Fire Your Guns
selections.reason: Just missed last start. Competitive rating of 55.

danger_horse.name: Hellberg
danger_horse.reason: Class dropper with the highest rating in the field.
